text.section: In Subtitles 1 through 11 of this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Commission" means the Commission on Civil Rights.
"Complainant" means a person that files a complaint alleging a discriminatory act under this title.

section.section: "Respondent" means a person accused in a complaint of a discriminatory act.
"Respondent" includes a person identified during an investigation of a complaint and joined as an additional or substitute respondent.

text.section: "Sexual orientation" means the identification of an individual as to male or female homosexuality, heterosexuality, or bisexuality.
